attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 40 more damage.

abilities.name: Dangerous Mucus
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon during your turn, you may make your opponent's Active Pokémon Burned and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Panic Vine
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. During your opponent's next turn, that Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Pull
attacks.text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spiny Punch
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached, this attack does 70 more damage.

abilities.name: Exciting Stage
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand. If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may draw cards until you have 4 cards in your hand instead. You can't use more than 1 Exciting Stage Ability each turn.

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 80 more damage.

abilities.name: Spring Bloom
abilities.text: As often as you like during your turn, you may attach a Grass Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon that doesn't have a Rule Box (Pokémon V, Pokémon-GX, etc. have Rule Boxes).

attacks.name: Big Bite
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Triple Whip
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Devour
attacks.text: For each of your Durant in play, discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Grass Cocooning
attacks.text: Heal 40 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Vital Powder
attacks.text: Heal all damage from 2 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Continuous Slash
attacks.text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Leaf Drain
attacks.text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Push Down
attacks.text: Your opponent switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Nature's Judgment
attacks.text: You may discard all Energy from this Pokémon. If you do, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Sour Spit
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon's attacks cost ColorlessColorless more.

attacks.name: Heat Dash
attacks.text: You may attach a Fire Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: V Bullet
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon V, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Flare Shot
attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Spreading Flames
attacks.text: Attach up to 3 Fire Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Max Victory
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon V, this attack does 120 more damage.

abilities.name: Fighting Fury Stance
abilities.text: Your Single Strike Pokémon's attacks do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Burning Licks
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, discard an Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Call Sign
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Perplex
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Derisive Roasting
attacks.text: This attack does 90 damage for each Special Condition affecting your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

abilities.name: Overheater
abilities.text: Whenever your opponent flips a coin for their Burned Pokémon during Pokémon Checkup, it doesn't recover from that Special Condition even if the result is heads.

attacks.name: Bursting Inferno
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Smokescreen
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

abilities.name: Deep Sea King
abilities.text: When your Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, you may move any amount of Water Energy from that Pokémon to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aqua Burst
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage for each Water Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Find It
attacks.text: Search your deck for an Item card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Ball Juggling
attacks.text: Discard any number of Item cards that have the word “Ball” in their name from your hand. This attack does 40 more damage for each card you discarded in this way.

abilities.name: Rapid Strike Search
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Rapid Strike card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. You can't use more than 1 Rapid Strike Search Ability each turn.

attacks.name: Bubble Beam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.

abilities.name: Emperor's Eyes
abilities.text: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, your opponent's Basic Pokémon in play have no Abilities, except for Pokémon with a Rule Box (Pokémon V, Pokémon-GX, etc. have Rule Boxes).

attacks.name: Swirling Slice
attacks.text: Move an Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Recover
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon and heal all damage from it.

attacks.name: Sediment Sink
attacks.text: This attack does 10 damage for each Water Energy card in your discard pile.

attacks.name: Haymaker
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Haymaker.

attacks.name: Tumbling Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Lightning Slam
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Lightning Slam.

attacks.name: Jumping Kick
attacks.text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Electrostep
attacks.text: This attack does 40 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scar Strikes
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 100 more damage.

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Spiral Thunder
attacks.text: This attack does 40 more damage for each Energy attached to all of your opponent's Pokémon.

attacks.name: Max Shock
attacks.text: If you have more Prize cards remaining than your opponent, their Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Ball Search
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may put a Poké Ball card, a Great Ball card, or 1 of each from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

attacks.name: Defiant Spark
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any damage counters on it, this attack can be used for Lightning.

attacks.name: Tantailizing
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon with their Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dazzle Dance
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Self-Destruct
attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 60 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Power Split
attacks.text: Attach Psychic Energy cards from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like until your Pokémon and your opponent's Pokémon have the same total amount of Energy attached.

attacks.name: Minor Errand-Running
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.name: Pleasant Tone
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Focused Wish
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

abilities.name: Ear Moves
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

abilities.name: Dummy Doll
abilities.text: When you play this Pokémon from your hand onto your Bench during your turn, you may prevent all damage done to this Mimikyu V by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon until the end of your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Jealous Eyes
attacks.text: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Active Pokémon for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

attacks.name: Prismatic Ray
attacks.text: This attack also does 20 damage to 2 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Special Laser
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Special Energy attached, this attack does 120 more damage.

attacks.name: Radar
attacks.text: Look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

attacks.name: Evomancy
attacks.text: For each Energy attached to this Pokémon, search your deck for a Stage 2 Pokémon, except Orbeetle, and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Field Crush

attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage for each of your Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it.

attacks.text: This Pokémon also does 60 damage to itself.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage for each heads.

attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused. Shuffle this Pokémon and all attached cards into your deck.

attacks.text: Discard the top 6 cards of your deck. This attack does 60 damage for each Fighting Energy card you discarded in this way.

attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage for each of your Rapid Strike Pokémon in play.

attacks.name: Land's Pulse
attacks.text: If a Stadium is in play, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Giga Hammer.

attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Fighting Energy cards and attach them to this Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck.

attacks.text: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Bruno
rules: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 4 cards. If any of your Pokémon were Knocked Out during your opponent's last turn, draw 7 cards instead.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Camping Gear
rules: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. Your turn ends.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Cheryl
rules: Heal all damage from each of your Evolution Pokémon. If you do, discard all Energy from the Pokémon that were healed in this way.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Energy Recycler
rules: Shuffle up to 5 basic Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Escape Rope
rules: Each player switches their Active Pokémon with 1 of their Benched Pokémon. (Your opponent switches first. If a player does not have a Benched Pokémon, that player doesn't switch Pokémon.)
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Exp. Share
rules: When your Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may move 1 basic Energy card that was attached to that Pokémon to the Pokémon this card is attached to.

name: Fan of Waves
rules: Put a Special Energy attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon on the bottom of their deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Korrina's Focus
rules: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Level Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon with 90 HP or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Phoebe
rules: During this turn, damage from your Pokémon VMAX's attacks isn't affected by any effects on your opponent's Active Pokémon.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Rapid Strike Scroll of Swirls
rules: The Rapid Strike Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)FightingColorlessColorless Matchless MaelstromThis attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Rapid Strike Style Mustard
rules: You can play this card only when it is the last card in your hand.Put a Rapid Strike Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench. If you do, draw 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Single Strike Scroll of Scorn
rules: The Single Strike Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)Fighting Furious Anger 10+This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on this Pokémon.

name: Single Strike Style Mustard
rules: You can play this card only when it is the last card in your hand.Search your deck for a Single Strike Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck. If you searched your deck in this way, draw 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Sordward & Shielbert
rules: Choose a Trainer card from your discard pile. Then, ask your opponent if you may put it into your hand. If yes, put that card into your hand. If no, draw 3 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Tool Jammer
rules: As long as the Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot, Pokémon Tools attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon have no effect, except for Tool Jammer.

name: Tower of Darkness
rules: Once during each player's turn, that player may draw 2 cards. In order to use this effect, that player must discard a Single Strike card from their hand.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Tower of Waters
rules: The Retreat Cost of each Rapid Strike Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) is ColorlessColorless less.
You may play only 1 Stadium card during your turn. Put it next to the Active Spot, and discard it if another Stadium comes into play. A Stadium with the same name can't be played.

name: Urn of Vitality
rules: Shuffle up to 2 Single Strike Energy cards from your discard pile into your deck.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rapid Strike Energy
rules: This card can only be attached to a Rapid Strike Pokémon. If this card is attached to anything other than a Rapid Strike Pokémon, discard this card.As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides 2 in any combination of Water Energy and Fighting Energy.

name: Single Strike Energy
rules: Premium Trainer Box Single Strike & Rapid Strike

rules: You can play this card only when it is the last card in your hand.Put a Rapid Strike Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench. If you do, draw 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

name: Single Strike Style Mustard
rules: You can play this card only when it is the last card in your hand.Search your deck for a Single Strike Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck. If you searched your deck in this way, draw 5 cards.
You may play only 1 Supporter card during your turn.

abilities.name: Rapid Strike Search
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Rapid Strike card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck. You can't use more than 1 Rapid Strike Search Ability each turn.

abilities.name: Single Strike Roar
abilities.text: Once during your turn, you may search your deck for a Single Strike Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Single Strike Pokémon. Then, shuffle your deck. If you attached Energy to a Pokémon in this way, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

name: Exp. Share
rules: When your Active Pokémon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, you may move 1 basic Energy card that was attached to that Pokémon to the Pokémon this card is attached to.

name: Level Ball
rules: Search your deck for a Pokémon with 90 HP or less, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
You may play any number of Item cards during your turn.

name: Rapid Strike Energy
rules: This card can only be attached to a Rapid Strike Pokémon. If this card is attached to anything other than a Rapid Strike Pokémon, discard this card.As long as this card is attached to a Pokémon, it provides 2 in any combination of Water Energy and Fighting Energy.

name: Single Strike Energy
rules: Premium Trainer Box Single Strike & Rapid Strike
